item.title: ‘Variety Confidential’: River Phoenix Left Behind Just 14 Film Credits but Also a Legacy That Reverberates to This Day
item.description: More than 30 years after River Phoenix’s tragic death outside Hollywood’s Viper Room, the late actor’s influence continues to ripple through the industry. That’s the focus of the latest — and final —
